## Bundle.BundleNormalizer.normalize() method

Creates a normalized ResourceManagerBuilder from an existing builder. The normalized builder will have identical entities but arranged in canonical order to ensure consistent index assignments.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static normalize(originalBuilder: ResourceManagerBuilder, systemConfig: SystemConfiguration): Result<ResourceManagerBuilder>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

originalBuilder


</td><td>

[ResourceManagerBuilder](./ts-res.resourcemanagerbuilder.md)


</td><td>

The ResourceManagerBuilder to normalize


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

systemConfig


</td><td>

[SystemConfiguration](./ts-res.config.systemconfiguration.md)


</td><td>

The SystemConfiguration used to create the original builder


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ResourceManagerBuilder](./ts-res.resourcemanagerbuilder.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Success with the normalized ResourceManagerBuilder if successful, Failure otherwise
